mapper.select: SELECT L.property_number, M.member_name AS ad_account, L.urgent_date, L.withdraw_date FROM equipment_log L LEFT JOIN member M ON (L.ad_account = M.ad_account) WHERE L.property_number = #{propertyNumber}
SELECT urgent_date FROM equipment_log WHERE property_number = #{propertyNumber} AND ad_account = #{adAccount} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT equipment_log(ad_account, property_number, urgent_date) VALUE (#{adAccount}, #{propertyNumber}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM equipment_map_person WHERE ad_account = #{adAccount} AND property_number = #{propertyNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE equipment_log SET withdraw_date = NOW() WHERE property_number = #{propertyNumber} AND ad_account = #{adAccount}
UPDATE equipment_log SET withdraw_date = NOW() WHERE ad_account = #{adAccount} AND withdraw_date IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT property_number, urgent_date, withdraw_date FROM equipment_log WHERE ad_account = #{adAccount}
SELECT E.property_number, M.ad_account FROM equipment E LEFT JOIN equipment_map_person M ON (E.property_number = M.property_number) WHERE E.property_number = #{propertyNumber}
